description: Maximal number of points in PG(2,q) with at most 3 on a line (next term is 21 or 22).
references: J. W. P. Hirschfeld and L. Storme, The packing problem in statistics, coding theory and finite projective spaces, J. Statist. Plann. Inference 72 (1998), no. 1-2, 355-380.
author: J. W. P. Hirschfeld [ jwph(AT)sussex.ac.uk ]
